snippet: Retailers should stop selling Camel Crush Bold, Pall Mall Deep Set Recessed Filter, Pall Mall Deep Set Recessed Filter Menthol and Vantage Tech 13 products immediately, the agency said.
abstract: Food and Drug Administration orders four types of R J Reynolds cigarettes removed from market, saying company has failed to prove they are not more dangerous than existing cigarette products; 2009 federal law states FDA can reject cigarettes scientists believe present greater health risk than comparable products.
lead_paragraph: Retailers should stop selling Camel Crush Bold, Pall Mall Deep Set Recessed Filter, Pall Mall Deep Set Recessed Filter Menthol and Vantage Tech 13 products immediately, the agency said.

headline.main: F.D.A. Bans Sales of 4 Cigarette Products by R.J. Reynolds
headline.print_headline: F.D.A. Takes 4 Types of R. J. Reynolds Cigarettes Off Market
